text:
Coast Guard has initiated efforts towards conservation of Olive Ridley turtles, whose nesting season in the eastern coast is in its peak, by rescuing those caught in fishing nets.

Sri Lankan refugees say they didn’t get relief

A section of Sri Lankan refugees living in camp at Gummidipoondi in Tiruvallur district and affected in the December floods have charged that they were not given the government’s relief.

HC grants emergency leave to Nalini

With the Madras HC granting 24 hours emergency leave to Rajiv Gandhi assasination convict S. Nalini, she was escorted out of Vellore prison to perform the 16th day funeral rites of her father who died on February 23.
title: Coast Guard reaches out turtles in distress
